channel.title: Security and Privacy
channel.description: Recent content on Security and Privacy

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Nicolae and I am a cybersecurity researcher at RISE Research Institutes of Sweden and Lund University. I am also the co-founder of CanaryBit AB. My speciality is distributed systems security - primarily cloud infrastructure, network security and confidential computing. I lead and participate in research projects investigating security and privacy for machine learning, eHealth security, cybersecurity for smart cities and secure orchestration systems for cloud and edge.

item.title: Standict 2021 06 15
item.description: On Tuesday June 15th I will be speaking for the ELITE-S Programme about my IETF standarization experience supported by the StandICT EU project. The idea of this presentation is to inspire the fellows of the ELITE-S programme to get involved into standarization activities.
